NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Fleet management, repair and maintenance services

CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition

CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BR504

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: BERD - Proyecto de trolebús en Lviv
BERD - Projet de trolleybus à Lviv
ΕΤΑΑ - Σχέδιο για λεωφορεία τρόλεϊ στη Lviv
BERS - Progetto di filobus a Lviv
EBOR - Projekt týkající se trolejbusů ve Lvově
EBOR - Projekt dotyczący trolejbusów we Lwowie
EBOR - Projekt trolejbusov v meste Ľvov
ЕБВР - Проект за тролейбуси в Лвов
BERD - Proiectul de troleibuz din Lviv

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Lviv Trolleybus Project
Country: Ukraine
Business sector: Municipal and Environmental Infrastructure
Project ID: 9015-GPN- 49844
Funding source: EBRD
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General procurement notice
Issue date: 6.3.2018
Closing date: 6.3.2019

The Lviv Municipal Enterprise “Lvivelectrotrans” (“the Company”), a municipal public transport operator, wholly owned by the City of Lviv and the management of the City of Lviv have applied for loan financing from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (“the Bank”) to finance the renewal of Company’s trolleybuses fleet and modernisation of selected infrastructure. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 18 000 000 EUR equivalent will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services using the proceeds of the loan:
— Low-floor 12m trolleybuses (including diagnostic equipment, tools, spare parts and associated services),
— Trolleybus maintenance and repair equipment,
— Rehabilitation and modernisation of 2 depots (to be confirmed),
— Rehabilitation and modernisation of catenary network and associated infrastructure (to be confirmed).
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the Q2 of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loan from the EBRD will be subject to the EBRD Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the EBRD loans will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Mr.Andriy Bilyy, Deputy Director Lviv Municipal Enterprise “Lvivelectrotrans”, Mr.Oleh Bereza, Director Lviv Municipal Enterprise “Lvivelectrotrans”, 2, Sakharova Str.,

— Trolleybus maintenance and repair equipment,
— Rehabilitation and modernisation of 2 depots (to be confirmed),
— Rehabilitation and modernisation of catenary network and associated infrastructure (to be confirmed).
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the Q2 of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loan from the EBRD will be subject to the EBRD Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the EBRD loans will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Mr.Andriy Bilyy, Deputy Director Lviv Municipal Enterprise “Lvivelectrotrans”, Mr.Oleh Bereza, Director Lviv Municipal Enterprise “Lvivelectrotrans”, 2, Sakharova Str.,
